text: Luis Ibero Elia (11 July 1949 - 10 November 2020) was a Spanish politician. He was Mayor of Zizur Mayor between 1992 to 1995. Ibero was President of the Commonwealth of Pamplona 2003 until 2007. He was a member of the Convergence of Democrats of Navarre. Ibero was born in Pamplona, Spain. Ibero died of COVID-19 on 10 November 2020 in Pamplona at the age of 71.Muere por coronavirus Luis Ibero, pol√≠tico y exmiembro de la Gestora de Osasuna ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Spanish mayors
title: Luis Ibero
